channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix co-CEO discussed Warner Bros. deal with Trump
item.description: Will Netflix’s $82.7 billion deal to acquire Warner Bros. get approval from federal regulators? While Paramount was assumed to be the frontrunner to a...

item.title: OpenAI boasts enterprise win days after internal ‘code red’ on Google threat
item.description: ChatGPT Enterprise usage grew 8x year-over-year as workers report saving an hour daily, but OpenAI faces competitive pressure from Anthropic and quest...

item.title: The accelerator is on the floor for autonomous vehicles
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: The Best Printers for Home and Office: Brother, HP, and More
item.description: It's a boring tool, but you need one. Here are the best home printers we have tested, from ink tank to lasers.

item.title: Coinbase starts onboarding users again in India, plans for fiat on-ramp next year
item.description: Coinbase is exploring expansion into India with a staggered relaunch and hiring for different roles.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Book Lovers (2025): E-Readers, Cozy Accessories, Book Sets
item.description: Any one of these gift ideas will make your favorite bookworm very happy, from e-readers and accessories to cozy reading essentials.

item.title: Coinbase starts onboarding users again in India, plans for fiat on-ramp next year
item.description: Coinbase is exploring expansion into India with a staggered relaunch and hiring for different roles.

item.title: What Are Gravel Running Shoes? (2025)
item.description: This new-ish hybrid between trail runners and road runners is designed for less technical terrain and the occasional road run.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s turned off app suggestions that look like ads
item.description: While OpenAI continues to insist that there are currently no ads — or tests for advertising — live in ChatGPT, the company’s chief research officer al...

item.title: X deactivates European Commission’s ad account after the company was fined €120M
item.description: X has seemingly penalized the European Commission's account after the commission fined the company over blue checkmarks and ad transparency.
